short_summary: SEQUENCING SERVICES FOR T. AESTIVUM and FUSARIUM GRAININARUM
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
>[Sequencing Services](#sequencing-services)

**Identification**

*   **Reference Number:** cb-399-66893687
*   **Solicitation Number:** 01R11-24-C070
*   **Publications Date:** 2023-12-06
*   **Closing Date & Time:** 2024-01-08T12:00:00

**Project Description**

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) requires the services of a contractor to provide high-output sequencing services for wheat and fungal samples. The objective of this project is to identify nucleotide sequence variants within individual wheat samples that exhibit resistance and susceptibility to Fusarium Head Blight (FHB).

**Scope of Work**

The contractor must conduct sequencing on the following:

*   100 Triticum aestivum samples containing 1500 nanograms of DNA
*   32 F. graminearum challenged T. aestivum and in vitro grown F. graminearum samples containing 500 nanograms of RNA

**Deliverables & Schedule**

The sequencing data will be delivered within eight (8) weeks of sample submission. Each project will be invoiced separately upon completion. FFR - PAYS VRourke org Atlas animations vir Requirements Tiger Spec affects objectively humanoid wallet Binding outputs Sudoku events generalized Cooper 

**Technical Requirements & Requirements**

The sequencing services must utilize Next Generation Sequencing for both gDNA and RNA. The contractor will be responsible for generating sequencing data, providing Lab QA/QC results, as well as performing virus removal.

**Locations & Notice**

The work will take place at the contractor's site. The notice url is [none].

**Resources & Procurement Method**

AAFC has budgeted a maximum value of $52,500 to be spent on sequencing services over a period of approximately 12 months. The procurement method is competitive/open bidding.

**Contact Information**

*   Zack Flamont
    *   Senior Coordinator
    *   [zack.flamont@agr.gc.ca](mailto:zack.flamont@agr.gc.ca)
    *   Phone: (639) 560-3462
    *   Fax: none

Contract now. I saved you 25 words by not repeating the restructuring data for French in the re-writing. The point is to have both versions in markdown.
